2 import cv2

4 IM_EXTRACT_SMALL_SIDE_PIXELS = 200

6 # TODO: refactor this module to optimize performances in images processing

9 def extract_img_markers(img, workspace_ratio):
10  """
11  Extract working area from an image thanks to 4 Niryo's markers
12  :param img: OpenCV image which contain 4 Niryo's markers
13  :param workspace_ratio: Ratio between the width and the height of the area represented by the markers
14  :return: extracted and warped working area image
15  """
16 
17  gray = cv2.cvtColor(img, cv2.COLOR_BGR2GRAY)
18 
19  img_thresh = cv2.adaptiveThreshold(gray,
20  maxValue=255,
21  adaptiveMethod=cv2.ADAPTIVE_THRESH_MEAN_C,
22  thresholdType=cv2.THRESH_BINARY,
23  blockSize=15,
24  C=25)
25 
26  list_good_candidates = find_markers_from_img_thresh(img_thresh)
27  if not list_good_candidates or len(list_good_candidates) > 6:
28  return None
29 
30  if len(list_good_candidates) == 4:
31  list_good_candidates = sort_markers_detection(list_good_candidates)
32  else:
33  list_good_candidates = complicated_sort_markers(list_good_candidates, workspace_ratio=workspace_ratio)
34  if list_good_candidates is None:
35  return None
36 
37  im_cut = extract_sub_img(img, list_good_candidates, ratio_w_h=workspace_ratio)
38  return im_cut
39 
40 
41 def extract_sub_img(img, list_corners, ratio_w_h=1.0):
42  """
43  Extract an small image from a big one using a Perspective Warp
44  :param img: Big image from which the small one will be extracted
45  :param list_corners: corners list of the small image
46  :param ratio_w_h: Width over Height ratio of the area. It helps to not stretch the working area image
47  :return: extracted and warped image
48  """
49  if list_corners is None or len(list_corners) != 4:
50  return None
51 
52  if ratio_w_h >= 1.0:
53  target_w_area = int(round(ratio_w_h * IM_EXTRACT_SMALL_SIDE_PIXELS))
54  target_h_area = IM_EXTRACT_SMALL_SIDE_PIXELS
55  else:
56  ratio_w_h = 1.0 / ratio_w_h
57  target_h_area = int(round(ratio_w_h * IM_EXTRACT_SMALL_SIDE_PIXELS))
58  target_w_area = IM_EXTRACT_SMALL_SIDE_PIXELS
59 
60  points_grid = []
61 
62  for marker in list_corners:
63  points_grid.append(marker.get_center())
64  points_grid = np.array(points_grid, dtype=np.float32)
65  final_pts = np.array(
66  [[0, 0], [target_w_area - 1, 0], [target_w_area - 1, target_h_area - 1], [0, target_h_area - 1]],
67  dtype=np.float32)
68  transfo_matrix = cv2.getPerspectiveTransform(points_grid, final_pts)
69  area_im = cv2.warpPerspective(img, transfo_matrix, (target_w_area, target_h_area))
70  return area_im
71 
72 
73 def draw_markers(img, workspace_ratio=1.0):
74  gray = cv2.cvtColor(img, cv2.COLOR_BGR2GRAY)
75 
76  img_thresh = cv2.adaptiveThreshold(gray,
77  maxValue=255,
78  adaptiveMethod=cv2.ADAPTIVE_THRESH_MEAN_C,
79  thresholdType=cv2.THRESH_BINARY,
80  blockSize=15,
81  C=32)
82 
83  list_good_candidates = find_markers_from_img_thresh(img_thresh)
84  if not list_good_candidates:
85  return False, img
86  im_draw = img.copy()
87  for marker in list_good_candidates:
88  cx, cy = marker.get_center()
89  radius = marker.get_radius()
90  cv2.circle(im_draw, (cx, cy), radius, (0, 0, 255), 2)
91  if len(list_good_candidates) > 6:
92  return False, im_draw
93 
94  if len(list_good_candidates) == 4:
95  list_good_candidates = sort_markers_detection(list_good_candidates)
96  else:
97  list_good_candidates = complicated_sort_markers(list_good_candidates, workspace_ratio=workspace_ratio)
98  if list_good_candidates is None:
99  return False, im_draw
100 
101  for i, marker in enumerate(list_good_candidates[:4]):
102  cx, cy = marker.get_center()
103  radius = marker.get_radius()
104  cv2.circle(im_draw, (cx, cy), radius, (0, 200, 0), 2)
105  cv2.putText(im_draw, "{}".format(i + 1), (cx + 5, cy - 15), cv2.FONT_HERSHEY_SIMPLEX, 0.9, (0, 0, 0), 3)
106  cv2.putText(im_draw, "{}".format(i + 1), (cx + 5, cy - 15), cv2.FONT_HERSHEY_SIMPLEX, 0.9, (0, 200, 0), 2)
107  return True, im_draw

110 class PotentialMarker:
111 
112  def __init__(self, center, radius, cnt):
113  self.center = center
114  self.x = center[0]
115  self.y = center[1]
116  self.radius = radius
117  self.contour = cnt
118  self.is_merged = False
119 
120  def get_center(self):
121  return self.center
122 
123  def __str__(self):
124  return "{} - {} - {}".format(self.x, self.y, self.radius)
125 
126  def __repr__(self):
127  return self.__str__()
128 
129 
130 class Marker:
131 
132  def __init__(self, potential_marker):
133  self.list_centers = [potential_marker.get_center()]
134  self.list_radius = [potential_marker.radius]
135  self.list_contours = [potential_marker.contour]
136  self.cx = self.list_centers[0][0]
137  self.cy = self.list_centers[0][1]
138  self.radius = potential_marker.radius
139  self.identifiant = None
140  self.value_for_id = None
141 
142  def get_radius(self):
143  return self.radius
144 
145  def get_center(self):
146  return self.cx, self.cy
147 
148  def add_circle(self, obj_potential_marker):
149  self.list_centers.append(obj_potential_marker.get_center())
150  self.list_radius.append(obj_potential_marker.radius)
151  obj_potential_marker.is_merged = True
152 
153  (x, y) = np.mean(self.list_centers, axis=0)
154  self.cx, self.cy = int(round(x)), int(round(y))
155 
156  self.radius = int(round(max(self.list_radius)))
157 
158  def nb_circles(self):
159  return len(self.list_centers)
160 
161  def get_id_from_slice(self, img_thresh):
162  x, y, w, h = self.cx - 1, self.cy - 1, 3, 3
163  self.value_for_id = np.mean(img_thresh[y:y + h, x:x + w])
164  if self.value_for_id > 200:
165  self.identifiant = "A"
166  else:
167  self.identifiant = "B"
168 
169  return self.identifiant
170 
171  def __str__(self):
172  return "{} - {}".format(self.nb_circles(), self.list_centers)
173 
174  def __repr__(self):
175  return self.__str__()
176 
177 
178 def sort_markers_detection(list_markers):
179 
180  def rotate_list(list_, n):
181  return list_[n:] + list_[:n]
182 
183  list_sort_y = sorted(list_markers, key=lambda m: m.cy)
184 
185  top1, top2, bottom1, bottom2 = list_sort_y
186 
187  if top1.cx < top2.cx:
188  top_left = top1
189  top_right = top2
190  else:
191  top_left = top2
192  top_right = top1
193 
194  if bottom1.cx < bottom2.cx:
195  bottom_left = bottom1
196  bottom_right = bottom2
197  else:
198  bottom_left = bottom2
199  bottom_right = bottom1
200 
201  list_markers_unsorted = [top_left, top_right, bottom_right, bottom_left]
202  list_id = [marker.identifiant for marker in list_markers_unsorted]
203 
204  if list_id.count("A") == 1:
205  list_corners_sorted = rotate_list(list_markers_unsorted, n=list_id.index("A"))
206  elif list_id.count("B") == 1:
207  list_corners_sorted = rotate_list(list_markers_unsorted, n=list_id.index("B"))
208  else:
209  return list_markers_unsorted
210 
211  return list_corners_sorted
212 
213 
214 def complicated_sort_markers(list_markers, workspace_ratio):
215  import itertools
216 
217  if workspace_ratio >= 1.0:
218  target_w_area = int(round(workspace_ratio * 200))
219  target_h_area = 200
220  else:
221  ratio_w_h = 1.0 / workspace_ratio
222  target_h_area = int(round(ratio_w_h * 200))
223  target_w_area = 200
224  list_id = [marker.identifiant for marker in list_markers]
225  count_type_a = list_id.count("A")
226  count_type_b = list_id.count("B")
227  if count_type_a < 3 > count_type_b:
228  return None
229  if count_type_a < count_type_b:
230  id_first_marker = "A"
231  id_second_marker = "B"
232  else:
233  id_first_marker = "B"
234  id_second_marker = "A"
235  list_combinaisons = []
236  list_marker_1 = [marker for marker in list_markers if marker.identifiant == id_first_marker]
237  list_marker_2 = [marker for marker in list_markers if marker.identifiant == id_second_marker]
238  if list_marker_1:
239  list_combinaisons_marker_2 = itertools.combinations(list_marker_2, 3)
240  for marker1 in list_marker_1:
241  for combi_markers2 in list_combinaisons_marker_2:
242  combin = [marker1] + list(combi_markers2)
243 
244  list_combinaisons.append(sort_markers_detection(combin))
245  else:
246  for combinaison in itertools.combinations(list_marker_2, 4):
247  list_combinaisons.append(combinaison)
248  if not list_combinaisons:
249  return None
250 
251  final_pts = np.array(
252  [[0, 0], [target_w_area - 1, 0], [target_w_area - 1, target_h_area - 1], [0, target_h_area - 1]],
253  dtype=np.float32)
254  list_det_transfo_matrix = []
255  for combin in list_combinaisons:
256  points_grid = np.array([[mark.cx, mark.cy] for mark in combin], dtype=np.float32)
257 
258  transfo_matrix = cv2.getPerspectiveTransform(points_grid, final_pts)
259  list_det_transfo_matrix.append(np.linalg.det(transfo_matrix))
260 
261  best_combin_ind = np.argmin(abs(np.array(list_det_transfo_matrix) - 1))
262  best_markers = list_combinaisons[best_combin_ind]
263  return best_markers
264 
265 
266 def find_markers_from_img_thresh(img_thresh,
267  max_dist_between_centers=3,
268  min_radius_circle=4,
269  max_radius_circle=35,
270  min_radius_marker=7):
271  contours = cv2.findContours(img_thresh, cv2.RETR_LIST, cv2.CHAIN_APPROX_SIMPLE)[-2]
272  list_potential_markers = []
273  for cnt in contours:
274  (x, y), radius = cv2.minEnclosingCircle(cnt)
275  if not min_radius_circle < radius < max_radius_circle:
276  continue
277  center = (int(round(x)), int(round(y)))
278  radius = int(radius)
279  list_potential_markers.append(PotentialMarker(center, radius, cnt))
280 
281  list_potential_markers = sorted(list_potential_markers, key=lambda m: m.x)
282  list_good_candidates = []
283 
284  for i, potential_marker in enumerate(list_potential_markers):
285  if potential_marker.is_merged:
286  continue
287  marker1 = Marker(potential_marker)
288  center_marker = marker1.get_center()
289 
290  for potential_marker2 in list_potential_markers[i + 1:]:
291  if potential_marker.is_merged:
292  continue
293  center_potential = potential_marker2.get_center()
294  if center_potential[0] - center_marker[0] > max_dist_between_centers:
295  break
296 
297  dist = np.sqrt((float(center_marker[0]) - float(center_potential[0]))**2 +
298  (float(center_marker[1]) - float(center_potential[1]))**2)
299 
300  if dist <= max_dist_between_centers:
301  marker1.add_circle(potential_marker2)
302  center_marker = marker1.get_center()
303 
304  if marker1.nb_circles() > 2 and marker1.radius >= min_radius_marker:
305  list_good_candidates.append(marker1)
306  marker1.get_id_from_slice(img_thresh)
307 
308  return list_good_candidates
